quoteText: Any material change to these Terms will be effective automatically 30 days after the revised Terms are first posted or, for users who register or otherwise provide opt-in consent during this 30-day period, at the time of registration or consent, as applicable.
title: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance

tosdr.case: When the service wants to make a material change to its terms, users are notified at least 30 days in advance
